no one.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: There’s no one else I really want to invite apart from you.
Has no one phoned about the car?
No one can say I didn’t warn you.
no one.translation[0].note_box[0].items[: Don’t use another negative word such as ‘not’ or ‘nothing’ after no one You say
No one did anything to help
No one did nothing to help
no one.translation[0].note_box[1].headin: USAGE: No one, none of, neither of
no one.translation[0].note_box[1].items[: You use none of when talking about a group of three or more people
You use neither of when talking about two people
Neither of his parents went to the wedding
